metadata.name: Revelation
metadata.description:
I loved myself
because you loved me
even stronger. 
I used your feeling 
to burn, 
to shine, 
but the flame 
gulped me down –
and no crown.
Dark little town 
full of bitterness, 
pain, 
losses, 
and tears.
How many years
have I lived
that way?
I can’t even say
that I tried 
to replace you. 
I didn’t. 
More than likely, 
I won’t. 
Nevertheless, 
I’ve built 
an invisible alter
for all the bygones 
not to be in vain. 
There’s no shame 
in sacrificing
if the prize is
unconditional love
to yourself. 
Thereof, 
fell the pain, 
let the tears drop, 
let the heart break. 
You’re worthy.
There’s no mistake.  

Mixed media painting on canvas, 2021. 
Resolution: 5142 x 3844 pixels.
